verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass, when<WH3588> men<WH120> began<WH2490> to multiply<WH7231> on<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth,<WH127> and daughters<WH1323> were born<WH3205> to them,
That the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> saw<WH7200> the daughters<WH1323> of men<WH120> that they were fair;<WH2896> and they took<WH3947> them wives<WH802> of all<WH3605> which<WH834> they chose.<WH977>

And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> My spirit<WH7307> shall not always<WH5769> strive<WH1777> with man,<WH120> for that he also<WH7683> is flesh:<WH1320> yet his days<WH3117> shall be an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> years.<WH8141>

There were giants<WH5303> in the earth<WH776> in those<WH1992> days;<WH3117> and also<WH1571> after<WH310> that, when<WH834> the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> came<WH935> in to the daughters<WH1323> of men,<WH120> and they bore<WH3205> children to them, the same<WH1992> became mighty<WH1368> men<WH120> which<WH834> were of old,<WH5769> men<WH582> of renown.<WH8034>

And God<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that the wickedness<WH7451> of man<WH120> was great<WH7227> in the earth,<WH776> and that every<WH3605> imagination<WH3336> of the thoughts<WH4284> of his heart<WH3820> was only<WH7535> evil<WH7451> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>
And it repented<WH5162> the LORD<WH3068> that he had made<WH6213> man<WH120> on<WH5921> the earth,<WH776> and it grieved<WH6087> him at<WH413> his heart.<WH3820>

And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> I will destroy<WH4229> man<WH120> whom<WH834> I have created<WH1254> from the face<WH6440> of the earth;<WH127> both man,<WH120> and beast,<WH929> and the creeping<WH7431> thing, and the fowls<WH5775> of the air;<WH8064> for it repents<WH5162> me that I have made<WH6213> them.
But Noah<WH5146> found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in the eyes<WH5869> of the LORD.<WH3068>
These<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Noah:<WH5146> Noah<WH5146> was a just<WH6662> man<WH376> and perfect<WH8549> in his generations,<WH8435> and Noah<WH5146> walked<WH1980> with God.<WH430>
And Noah<WH5146> begat<WH3205> three<WH7969> sons,<WH1121> Shem,<WH8035> Ham,<WH2526> and Japheth.<WH3315>
The earth<WH776> also was corrupt<WH7843> before<WH6440> God,<WH430> and the earth<WH776> was filled<WH4390> with violence.<WH2555>
And God<WH430> looked<WH7200> on the earth,<WH776> and, behold,<WH2009> it was corrupt;<WH7843> for all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> had corrupted<WH7843> his way on the earth.<WH776>

And God<WH430> said<WH559> to Noah,<WH5146> The end<WH7093> of all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> is come<WH935> before<WH6440> me; for the earth<WH776> is filled<WH4390> with violence<WH2555> through<WH6440> them; and, behold,<WH2005> I will destroy<WH7843> them with the earth.<WH776>

Make<WH6213> you an ark<WH8392> of gopher<WH1613> wood;<WH6086> rooms<WH7064> shall you make<WH6213> in the ark,<WH8392> and shall pitch<WH3722> it within<WH1004> and without<WH2351> with pitch.<WH3724>

And this<WH2088> is the fashion which<WH834> you shall make<WH6213> it of: The length<WH753> of the ark<WH8392> shall be three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> cubits,<WH520> the breadth<WH7341> of it fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the height<WH6967> of it thirty<WH7970> cubits.<WH520>

A window<WH6672> shall you make<WH6213> to the ark,<WH8392> and in a cubit<WH520> shall you finish<WH3615> it above;<WH4605> and the door<WH6607> of the ark<WH8392> shall you set<WH7760> in the side<WH6654> thereof; with lower,<WH8482> second,<WH8145> and third<WH7992> stories shall you make<WH6213> it.

And, behold,<WH2005> I, even I, do bring<WH935> a flood<WH3999> of waters<WH4325> on the earth,<WH776> to destroy<WH7843> all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> wherein<WH834> is the breath<WH7307> of life,<WH2416> from under<WH8478> heaven;<WH8064> and every<WH3605> thing that is in the earth<WH776> shall die.<WH1478>

But with you will I establish<WH6965> my covenant;<WH1285> and you shall come<WH935> into<WH413> the ark,<WH8392> you, and your sons,<WH1121> and your wife,<WH802> and your sons'<WH1121>wives<WH802> with you.

And of every<WH3605> living<WH2416> thing of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> two<WH8147> of every<WH3605> sort shall you bring<WH935> into<WH413> the ark,<WH8392> to keep<WH8104> them alive<WH2421> with you; they shall be male<WH2145> and female.<WH5347>

Of fowls<WH5775> after their kind,<WH4327> and of cattle<WH929> after their kind,<WH4327> of every<WH3605> creeping<WH7431> thing of the earth<WH127> after his kind,<WH4327> two<WH8147> of every<WH3605> sort shall come<WH935> to you, to keep<WH8104> them alive.<WH2421>
And take<WH3947> you to you of all<WH3605> food<WH3978> that is eaten,<WH398> and you shall gather<WH622> it to you; and it shall be for food<WH402> for you, and for them.
Thus did<WH6213> Noah;<WH5146> according to all<WH3605> that God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> him, so<WH3651> did<WH6213> he.
